titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to I. W. Scott
CWG13651

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To I W. Scott, Dr.
1864

row.cell: To amount of money expended in travelling to the different Military Hospital in the States of Missouri, Illinois, Indiana, Ohio, Tenn. & Kentucky visiting sick and wounded Kentucky soldiers and furnishing them with money and necessary articles of clothing &c by order of the Governor to date of this at Two Hundred & fifty Seven dollars,

body.p: The Quarter Master General is dierected to pay the above account out of the military Fund June 23. 1864
I certify that the above is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 23d of June, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, the sum of Two Hundred & fifty Seven dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account.

507
No. 12.
No 97 Abstract G
I W Scott
Dollars 257.00/100
Paid June 23d 1864
